response.original_title: National Geographic Explorer: Guerilla Gold Rush
response.overview: Colombia is in the throws of a gold rush unlike anything it has seen in years. Across dense jungle and the rural countryside, wildcat miners are tearing up huge swaths of land in a frenzied search for the precious metal. Even more worrying for authorities is that this gold may be fueling a new chapter in the civil conflict that has defined Colombia for the last five decades.
response.title: National Geographic Explorer: Guerilla Gold Rush
